channel.title: Nicholas Hoult on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Nicholas Hoult on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Box Office: ‘Superman’ Saves the Day for DC Studios With Solid $115M-$120M Domestic Opening
item.description: Directed by James Gunn, the superhero pic appears to be succeeding in rebooting both the Warner Bros.-owned DC and its most prized comic book film franchise.
